author: Danny Schwartz
title: Roc Marciano - Rosebudd's Revenge [Album Stream]
text:
100% (1) Long Island's Roc Marciano releases "Rosebudd's Revenge," his first full-length release in over three years. 
Long Island's Roc Marciano waited three years to release the follow-up to his 2013 album Marci Beaucoup . After releasing Rosebudd's Revenge on his website last week, he has now made the album available on all listening platforms. 
Rosebuddâ€™s Revenge is 15 tracks long. Marciano primarily handles production himself, with some assistance from Knxwledge, Animoss, and others. The album is available on iTunes and all streaming platforms. 
ScHoolboy Q is feeling Rosebudd's Revenge. "THank u big dawg sHit bangin @rocmarci," he wrote on Twitter. "Best album so far." Listen here on Spotify and let us know what you think. Rosebudd's Revenge [Album Stream]
